description.paragraph1: My interest in technology began at an early age and grew into a true vocation. I started by exploring languages like HTML, CSS, and PHP, and during university, I dove deeper into Python and Java. Over time, React became a key part of my stack, allowing me to build modern and scalable solutions.
description.paragraph2: I’m passionate about continuous learning, which is why I’m currently expanding my knowledge in cloud technologies and methodologies that better integrate design with development. I enjoy turning ideas into functional digital products, combining logic, attention to detail, and a strong user-centered approach.
